did.unittitle: Identified as "Lyle School"; Students, teacher, and Superintendent Massillon Alexander (M.A.) Cassidy stand in front of a white school house with a porch. The teacher holds a slate board that reads "Lyle School Dist 12 Hettie Rouse Teachers" A handwritten note beneath the photo states "New house here". A piece of note paper also states "Miss Hetti Rouse teacher"
